result.title: Please help me with this problem! (solved)
result.content:
Okay, so I was doing problem 478B, and...

(Sorry if the text is small.)

n = 999000001

So n * (n — 1) / 2 should end with a zero, right?

But because CodeForces doesn't accept floats, I have to change it into an integer. But Python screws up and changes the last two digits into 32. Can someone help me please?

Edit: Thanks to madn for the answer, and thanks to TooNewbie for the suggestion!
